welcome.title: Welcome to Appointment Management
welcome.content: This module allows you to manage all patient appointments. Here you can view, filter, edit and update appointment statuses.

filters.title: Search Filters
filters.content: Use these filters to find specific appointments. You can filter by date range, appointment status and area/office.

dateFilter.title: Filter by Date
dateFilter.content: Select a date range to view appointments. Current date is shown by default. Use the reset button to return to today.

statusFilter.title: Filter by Status
statusFilter.content: Filter appointments by their status: Waiting, Attended, Cancelled, etc. Click to see all available options.

areaFilter.title: Filter by Area or Office
areaFilter.content: Filter appointments by specific medical area (such as Pediatrics, Cardiology) or by individual office.

table.title: Appointments Table
table.content: Here all appointments matching your filters are displayed. Each row contains appointment information, patient data and management options.

turnInfo.title: Appointment Information
turnInfo.content: Each appointment shows the number, patient, date/time, area, office and current status. You can see all details at a glance.

actions.title: Appointment Actions
actions.content: Use these buttons to manage the appointment: update status, edit information or cancel the appointment if necessary.

statusBadge.title: Visual Status
statusBadge.content: Appointment status is shown with distinctive colors: yellow (waiting), green (attended), red (cancelled), etc.

pagination.title: Page Navigation
pagination.content: If you have many appointments, use these controls to navigate between pages. Shows 5 appointments per page for better visualization.

history.title: View History
history.content: Click here to access the complete appointment history, where you can view detailed statistics and reports.

refresh.title: Refresh Data
refresh.content: Use this button to reload information and ensure you're viewing the most recent data.

welcome.title: Welcome to Patient Management
welcome.content: This module allows you to manage all patient information. Here you can register, edit, search and manage the status of each patient.

actions.title: Main Actions
actions.content: Use these buttons to update the patient list or add a new patient to the system.

stats.title: Patient Statistics
stats.content: Here you can see general statistics: total registered patients, active patients, inactive patients and those with email addresses.

filters.title: Search and Filters
filters.content: Use the search bar to find patients by name, last name, phone or email. You can also filter by status (active/inactive).

searchInput.title: Quick Search
searchInput.content: Type in this field to search for patients. The search is performed in real time and filters by name, last name, phone or email.

statusSelect.title: Filter by Status
statusSelect.content: Use this selector to filter patients by their status: all, active only or inactive only.

table.title: Patient Table
table.content: Here the complete list of patients is shown with all their information: name, phone, date of birth, age, email, status and registration date.

patientInfo.title: Patient Information
patientInfo.content: Each row shows the complete patient data. You can see their name, contact information, automatically calculated age and current status.

statusBadge.title: Patient Status
statusBadge.content: Patient status is indicated with colors: green for active and gray for inactive. This allows you to quickly identify who can receive care.

patientActions.title: Patient Actions
patientActions.content: Use these buttons to edit patient information or delete their record from the system.

welcome.title: Welcome to Office Management
welcome.content: This module allows you to manage medical areas and their offices. Here you can create, edit and organize your medical center's structure.

actions.title: Main Actions
actions.content: Use these buttons to create new medical areas, add offices, view the tutorial or update information.

search.title: Search and Filters
search.content: Search for specific areas or offices by typing in the search field. Results are filtered in real time.

areasGrid.title: Medical Areas
areasGrid.content: Here all medical areas of your center are shown. Each card represents an area with its color, icon and associated offices.

areaCard.title: Area Card
areaCard.content: Each area shows its name, identifying letter, number of offices and options to edit, delete or activate/deactivate.

areaHeader.title: Area Header
areaHeader.content: The header shows the icon, color and name of the area. The color and icon help quickly identify each specialty.

consultoriosList.title: Office List
consultoriosList.content: Here all offices belonging to this area are listed. Each office has its own identification number.

consultorioItem.title: Individual Office
consultorioItem.content: Each office shows its number and options to edit, delete or change its active/inactive status.

areaActions.title: Area Actions
areaActions.content: Use these buttons to edit the area, delete the entire area, or activate/deactivate its availability.

addConsultorio.title: Add Office
addConsultorio.content: Click this button to add a new office to this specific area.

welcome.title: Welcome to User Management
welcome.content: This module allows you to manage all system administrative users. Here you can create, edit and manage super administrators and supervisors.

actions.title: Main Actions
actions.content: Use these buttons to update the user list or add a new administrative user to the system.

stats.title: User Statistics
stats.content: Here you can see general statistics: total administrative users, super administrators and supervisors registered in the system.

filters.title: User Search
filters.content: Use the search bar to find users by username, full name, email or phone. The search is performed in real time.

searchInput.title: Quick Search
searchInput.content: Type in this field to search for users. The search filters by username, full name, email or phone number.

table.title: User Table
table.content: Here the complete list of administrative users is shown with all their information: username, name, email, phone, user type and registration date.

userInfo.title: User Information
userInfo.content: Each row shows the complete data of the administrative user. You can see their username, contact information and assigned role type.

statusBadge.title: User Type
statusBadge.content: User type is indicated with colors and icons: yellow with crown for Super Administrators and green with shield for Supervisors.

userActions.title: User Actions
userActions.content: Use these buttons to edit user information or delete their account from the system. You cannot delete your own account.

welcome.title: Welcome to Appointment History
welcome.content: This module allows you to query and review the complete appointment history. Here you can filter, search and analyze all appointments registered in the system.

actions.title: Main Actions
actions.content: Use these buttons to return to appointment management or update history information.

filters.title: Search Filters
filters.content: Use these filters to find specific appointments by date, appointment status and area/office. Filters are applied automatically.

dateRange.title: Filter by Date Range
dateRange.content: Select start and end dates to view appointments within that period. Use the reset button to return to the default range.

statusFilter.title: Filter by Status
statusFilter.content: Filter appointments by their status: All, Waiting, Attended, Cancelled, Not present, etc. Colors help you identify each status.

areaFilter.title: Filter by Area or Office
areaFilter.content: Filter appointments by specific medical area or individual office. You can view all or select a specific one.

cards.title: Appointment Cards
cards.content: Here all appointments are shown in card format. Each card contains complete appointment information: number, patient, date, time, area, office and status.

cardInfo.title: Appointment Information
cardInfo.content: Each card shows the area icon and color, appointment number, patient name, date and time of care, assigned office and current status with its distinctive color.

pagination.title: Pagination Controls
pagination.content: Use these controls to navigate between history pages. You can go to the first, previous, next or last page, and see the total available pages.
